name: DiceDungeon (barret232hxc)
description:
Are you ready to unveil the secrets of the Dice Dungeon?

Dice Dungeon is a roguelite game where you play your way inside a dungeon full of mysterious dice monsters and grow stronger. based roguelite top down game using 6 sided dice. The game could be endless and you just try to see how far you can make it.

Whats inside: 

6 different characters each one with a special Skill

The Elf = passive skill: Extra Speed ( 1.5 x faster )
The Dwarf  = passive skill: Extra Health ( +1 health )
The Barbarian = passive skill: Extra Damage ( do +1 damage )
The Minotaur = passive skill: Extra Defense ( take -1 damage )
The WeaponMaster = passive skill:  2 weapon dice to choose from 
The Dryad = passive skill:1 less enemy in room

Many Different unique Enemies

6 Different Powerups 

  1. Faster fire rate
    1. For bombs this would be an extra bomb
    2. For charge shot it’s faster charge
  2. Dead Enemies turn into bombs 
    1. stacks by doing more damage if you already have this upgrade 
  3. +1 defense ( enemy attacks always do at least 1 damage )
  4. +1 attack
  5. +1 health
  6. Attack drone ( stacks by having additional drone )

6 different Weapons

  1. Single bullet pea shooter max range ( standard fire rate )
  2. Dual bullet pea shooter max range ( standard fire rate )
  3. Shotgun 3 spread blast short range ( slow fire rate )
  4. 4 way shot from all 4 directions ( slow fire rate )
  5. Charge Shot, have to hold down and charge but it is a piercing shot 
  6. Bombs ( bombs blow up on timer or if enemies touch them ) only 1 bomb at a time at first
